abilities.name: Extra Liquid
abilities.effect: Each player's Pokémon-ex can't use any Poké-Powers and pays Colorless more Energy to use its attacks. Each Pokémon can't be affected by more than 1 Extra Liquid Poké-Body.

attacks.name: Power Revenge
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.
